name: HeroSignup
description: Full-screen centered hero section with tag badge above title, centered text content, configurable background, and email signup form below.

title.example: Join the Future of Web Development

description.example: Be the first to experience our revolutionary platform. Sign up now and get exclusive early access.

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <HeroSignup
    title="Join the Future of Web Development"
    description="Be the first to experience our revolutionary platform."
    background={{ variant: 'plain' }}
    tag="Early Access"
    tagIcon={Sparkles}
    inputPlaceholder="Enter your email"
    buttonText="Get Early Access"
    onSubmit={(email) => console.log(email)}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use ONLY for waitlist or coming soon websites
Use for single-page early access email capture
dont: Never use for any other type of website
Never use for product, company, or portfolio websites
Do not use for heroes that need multiple CTA buttons
Do not use for heroes with media content
